      • findMailboxSubscriptionForUser

        Subscription findMailboxSubscriptionForUser(String user,
                                          String mailbox)
                                            throws SubscriptionException
        Finds any subscriptions for a given user to the given mailbox.
        Parameters:
        user - not null
        mailbox - not null
        Returns:
        Subscription, or null when the user is not subscribed to the given mailbox
        Throws:
        SubscriptionException
